title: Travis Kelce Reveals the Surprising Food Taylor Swift Introduced Him To
description: His palate is expanding! READ MORE...
author: The Kitchn Editors
text: People & CultureNewsWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: David Eulitt/Getty ImagesSometimes romantic relationships serve a grander purpose and can truly help you venture outside your comfort zone. Taylor Swift has been helping Travis Kelce expand his palate to get him to eat more delicious foods.Not everyone is born with an adventurous palate, and while Kelce may find himself in some of the top restaurants across the world, that doesn’t mean that he has developed an appreciation for certain cuisines.“I know, my girl Tay is getting you opened up,” Jason said. Travis replied, “She is.” In the episode, Travis explained that Swift introduced him to curry. Jason chimed in, saying, “She’s introducing new foods to you,” before he added, “It’s been one of the greatest things that I’ve been happy about.” Travis explains that he enjoys curry, but prefers the “light” options as opposed to the thicker dishes. There are many dishes that vary depending on factors like regionality and culture when it comes to Indian cuisine. Each kind has specific blends of spices and aromatics, making them flavorful. Some favorites are chicken tikka masala and lamb curry.It’s great that Swift is introducing Travis to different foods. We already know that she loves to cook for her boyfriend and make him pre-game treats like homemade cinnamon rolls. We wonder what he’ll try next!
html:
• People & Culture
  • News

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

Sometimes romantic relationships serve a grander purpose and can truly help you venture outside your comfort zone. Taylor Swift has been helping Travis Kelce expand his palate to get him to eat more delicious foods.

Not everyone is born with an adventurous palate, and while Kelce may find himself in some of the top restaurants across the world, that doesn’t mean that he has developed an appreciation for certain cuisines.

“I know, my girl Tay is getting you opened up,” Jason said. Travis replied, “She is.” In the episode, Travis explained that Swift introduced him to curry. Jason chimed in, saying, “She’s introducing new foods to you,” before he added, “It’s been one of the greatest things that I’ve been happy about.” 

Travis explains that he enjoys curry, but prefers the “light” options as opposed to the thicker dishes. There are many dishes that vary depending on factors like regionality and culture when it comes to Indian cuisine. Each kind has specific blends of spices and aromatics, making them flavorful. Some favorites are chicken tikka masala and lamb curry.

It’s great that Swift is introducing Travis to different foods. We already know that she loves to cook for her boyfriend and make him pre-game treats like homemade cinnamon rolls. We wonder what he’ll try next!
